description: Comprehensive Shopify data synchronization. Syncs products, orders, and/or inventory levels from Shopify to database. Returns sync statistics with counts of created, updated, and deleted items

data_type.description: Type of data to sync: 'products', 'orders', 'inventory', or 'all'. Defaults to 'all'

limit.description: Maximum number of items to sync per type. Defaults to 100

force_refresh.description: If true, bypass cache and force refresh from Shopify
